item.title: 2022 Intro
item.description: It’s 2022. The year the world will hopefully go back to normal. With a new year most people will hope to be a better person in a year’s time. Most people fail. This year I’m not hoping, I’m doing. I started this to keep myself accountable, retain more of what I wrote, and inspire others to do the same. Last year I noticed I had developed an addiction to screens and watching video online.
